verses.verse: וּפְלִשְׁתִּ֖ים <WH6430> u-fe-lish-Tim Now the Philistines נִלְחֲמ֣וּ <WH3898> nil-cha-Mu fought בְיִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <WH3478> ve-Yis-ra-'El; against Israel וַיָּ֑נָס <WH5127> vai-Ya-nos; fled אִֽישׁ־ <WH376> 'ish- and the men יִשְׂרָאֵל֙ <WH3478> Yis-ra-'El of Israel מִפְּנֵ֣י <WH6440> mip-pe-Nei from before פְלִשְׁתִּ֔ים <WH6430> fe-lish-Tim, the Philistines וַיִּפְּל֥וּ <WH5307> vai-yip-pe-Lu and fell down חֲלָלִ֖ים <WH2491> cha-la-Lim slain בְּהַ֥ר <WH2022> be-Har in mount גִּלְבֹּֽעַ׃ <WH1533> gil-Bo-a'. Gilboa

וַיַּדְבְּק֣וּ <WH1692> vai-yad-be-Ku followed hard פְלִשְׁתִּ֔ים <WH6430> fe-lish-Tim, And the Philistines אַחֲרֵ֥י <WH310> 'a-cha-Rei after שָׁא֖וּל <WH7586> sha-'Ul Saul וְאַחֲרֵ֣י <WH310> ve-'a-cha-Rei and after בָנָ֑יו <WH1121> va-Nav; his sons וַיַּכּ֣וּ <WH5221> vai-yak-Ku slew פְלִשְׁתִּ֗ים <WH6430> fe-lish-Tim, and the Philistines אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- יוֹנָתָ֧ן <WH3129> yo-na-Tan Jonathan וְאֶת־ <WH853> ve-'Et אֲבִינָדָ֛ב <WH41> 'a-vi-na-Dav and Abinadab וְאֶת־ <WH853> ve-'Et מַלְכִּי־ mal-ki- שׁ֖וּעַ <WH4444> Shu-a' and Malchishua בְּנֵ֥י <WH1121> be-Nei the sons שָׁאֽוּל׃ <WH7586> sha-'Ul. of Saul

וַתִּכְבַּ֤ד <WH3513> vat-tich-Bad went sore הַמִּלְחָמָה֙ <WH4421> ham-mil-cha-Mah And the battle עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- against שָׁא֔וּל <WH7586> sha-'Ul, against Saul וַיִּמְצָאֻ֖הוּ <WH4672> vai-yim-tza-'U-hu hit הַמּוֹרִ֣ים <WH3384> ham-mo-Rim of the archers בַּקָּ֑שֶׁת <WH7198> bak-Ka-shet; arch וַיָּ֖חֶל <WH2342> vai-Ya-chel him and he was wounded מִן־ <WH4480> min- by הַיּוֹרִֽים׃ <WH3384> hai-yo-Rim. the archers

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <WH559> vai-Yo-mer Then said שָׁאוּל֩ <WH7586> sha-'Ul Saul אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- about נֹשֵׂ֨א <WH5375> no-Se bearer כֵלָ֜יו <WH3627> che-Lav to his armor שְׁלֹ֥ף <WH8025> she-Lof Draw חַרְבְּךָ֣׀ <WH2719> char-be-Cha thy sword וְדָקְרֵ֣נִי <WH1856> ve-da-ke-Re-ni and thrust בָ֗הּ Vah, פֶּן־ <WH6435> pen- otherwise יָבֹ֜אוּ <WH935> ya-Vo-'u come הָעֲרֵלִ֤ים <WH6189> ha-'a-re-Lim me through therewith lest these uncircumcised הָאֵ֙לֶּה֙ <WH428> ha-'El-leh these וְהִתְעַלְּלוּ־ <WH5953> ve-hit-'al-le-lu- and abuse בִ֔י Vi, וְלֹ֤א <WH3808> ve-Lo not אָבָה֙ <WH14> 'a-Vah would נֹשֵׂ֣א <WH5375> no-Se bearer כֵלָ֔יו <WH3627> che-Lav, his armor כִּ֥י <WH3588> ki for יָרֵ֖א <WH3372> ya-Re afraid מְאֹ֑ד <WH3966> me-'Od; not for he was sore ס sa-Mek וַיִּקַּ֤ח <WH3947> vai-yik-Kach took שָׁאוּל֙ <WH7586> sha-'Ul So Saul אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- הַחֶ֔רֶב <WH2719> ha-Che-rev, a sword וַיִּפֹּ֖ל <WH5307> vai-yip-Pol and fell עָלֶֽיהָ׃ <WH5921> 'a-Lei-ha. and

וַיַּ֥רְא <WH7200> vai-Yar saw נֹשֵֽׂא־ <WH5375> no-se- bearer כֵלָ֖יו <WH3627> che-Lav his armor כִּ֣י <WH3588> ki for מֵ֣ת <WH4191> met was dead שָׁא֑וּל <WH7586> sha-'Ul; that Saul וַיִּפֹּ֥ל <WH5307> vai-yip-Pol he fell גַּם־ <WH1571> gam- likewise ה֛וּא <WH1931> hu he עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- on הַחֶ֖רֶב <WH2719> ha-Che-rev likewise on the sword וַיָּמֹֽת׃ <WH4191> vai-ya-Mot. and died ס sa-Mek

וַיָּ֤מָת <WH4191> vai-Ya-mot died שָׁאוּל֙ <WH7586> sha-'Ul So Saul וּשְׁלֹ֣שֶׁת <WH7969> u-she-Lo-shet and his three בָּנָ֔יו <WH1121> ba-Nav, sons וְכָל־ <WH3605> ve-chol and all בֵּית֖וֹ <WH1004> bei-To and all his house יַחְדָּ֥ו <WH3162> yach-Dav together מֵֽתוּ׃ <WH4191> Me-tu. died

וַ֠יִּרְאוּ <WH7200> Vai-yir-'u saw כָּל־ <WH3605> kol- all אִ֨ישׁ <WH376> 'ish And when all the men יִשְׂרָאֵ֤ל <WH3478> Yis-ra-'El of Israel אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> 'a-Sher- who בָּעֵ֙מֶק֙ <WH6010> ba-'E-mek that [were] in the valley כִּ֣י <WH3588> ki for נָ֔סוּ <WH5127> Na-su, that they fled וְכִי־ <WH3588> ve-chi- for מֵ֖תוּ <WH4191> Me-tu were dead שָׁא֣וּל <WH7586> sha-'Ul and that Saul וּבָנָ֑יו <WH1121> u-va-Nav; and his sons וַיַּעַזְב֤וּ <WH5800> vai-ya-'az-Vu then they forsook עָרֵיהֶם֙ <WH5892> 'a-rei-Hem their cities וַיָּנֻ֔סוּ <WH5127> vai-ya-Nu-su, and fled וַיָּבֹ֣אוּ <WH935> vai-ya-Vo-'u came פְלִשְׁתִּ֔ים <WH6430> fe-lish-Tim, and the Philistines וַיֵּשְׁב֖וּ <WH3427> vai-ye-she-Vu and dwelt בָּהֶֽם׃ ba-Hem. ס sa-Mek

וַיְהִי֙ <WH1961> vay-Hi came מִֽמָּחֳרָ֔ת <WH4283> mi-mo-cho-Rat, And it came to pass on the morrow וַיָּבֹ֣אוּ <WH935> vai-ya-Vo-'u came פְלִשְׁתִּ֔ים <WH6430> fe-lish-Tim, when the Philistines לְפַשֵּׁ֖ט <WH6584> le-fash-Shet to strip אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- הַֽחֲלָלִ֑ים <WH2491> ha-cha-la-Lim; the slain וַֽיִּמְצְא֤וּ <WH4672> vai-yim-tze-'U that they found אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- שָׁאוּל֙ <WH7586> sha-'Ul Saul וְאֶת־ <WH853> ve-'Et בָּנָ֔יו <WH1121> ba-Nav, and his sons נֹפְלִ֖ים <WH5307> no-fe-Lim fallen בְּהַ֥ר <WH2022> be-Har in mount גִּלְבֹּֽעַ׃ <WH1533> gil-Bo-a'. Gilboa

וַיַּ֨פְשִׁיטֻ֔הוּ <WH6584> vai-Yaf-shi-Tu-hu, And when they had stripped וַיִּשְׂא֥וּ <WH5375> vai-yis-'U him they took אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- רֹאשׁ֖וֹ <WH7218> ro-Sho his head וְאֶת־ <WH853> ve-'Et כֵּלָ֑יו <WH3627> ke-Lav; and his armour וַיְשַׁלְּח֨וּ <WH7971> vay-shal-le-Chu and sent בְאֶֽרֶץ־ <WH776> ve-'e-retz- into the land פְלִשְׁתִּ֜ים <WH6430> fe-lish-Tim of the Philistines סָבִ֗יב <WH5439> sa-Viv, round about לְבַשֵּׂ֛ר <WH1319> le-vas-Ser to carry tidings אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- עֲצַבֵּיהֶ֖ם <WH6091> 'a-tzab-bei-Hem unto their idols וְאֶת־ <WH853> ve-'Et הָעָֽם׃ <WH5971> ha-'Am. and to the people

וַיָּשִׂ֙ימוּ֙ <WH7760> vai-ya-Si-mu And they put אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- כֵּלָ֔יו <WH3627> ke-Lav, his armour בֵּ֖ית <WH1004> beit in the house אֱלֹהֵיהֶ֑ם <WH430> 'e-lo-hei-Hem; of their gods וְאֶת־ <WH853> ve-'Et גֻּלְגָּלְתּ֥וֹ <WH1538> gul-gal-To his head תָקְע֖וּ <WH8628> ta-ke-'U and fastened בֵּ֥ית <WH1004> beit in the temple דָּגֽוֹן׃ <WH1712> da-Gon. of Dagon ס sa-Mek

וַֽיִּשְׁמְע֔וּ <WH8085> vai-yish-me-'U, heard כֹּ֖ל <WH3605> kol all יָבֵ֣ישׁ <WH3003> ya-Veish Jobesh גִּלְעָ֑ד <WH1568> gil-'Ad; Gilead אֵ֛ת <WH853> 'et כָּל־ <WH3605> kol- all אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> 'a-Sher- after עָשׂ֥וּ <WH6213> 'a-Su had done פְלִשְׁתִּ֖ים <WH6430> fe-lish-Tim all that the Philistines לְשָׁאֽוּל׃ <WH7586> le-sha-'Ul. to Saul

וַיָּקוּמוּ֮ <WH6965> vai-ya-ku-Mu They arose כָּל־ <WH3605> kol- all אִ֣ישׁ <WH376> 'ish men חַיִל֒ <WH2428> cha-Yil all the valiant וַיִּשְׂא֞וּ <WH5375> vai-yis-'U and took away אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- גּוּפַ֣ת <WH1480> gu-Fat the body שָׁא֗וּל <WH7586> sha-'Ul, of Saul וְאֵת֙ <WH853> ve-'Et גּוּפֹ֣ת <WH1480> gu-Fot and the bodies בָּנָ֔יו <WH1121> ba-Nav, of his sons וַיְבִיא֖וּם <WH935> vay-vi-'Um and brought יָבֵ֑ישָׁה <WH3003> ya-Vei-shah; them to Jabesh וַיִּקְבְּר֨וּ <WH6912> vai-yik-be-Ru and buried אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- עַצְמוֹתֵיהֶ֜ם <WH6106> atz-mo-tei-Hem their bones תַּ֤חַת <WH8478> Ta-chat under הָאֵלָה֙ <WH424> ha-'e-Lah under the oak בְּיָבֵ֔שׁ <WH3003> be-ya-Vesh, in Jabesh וַיָּצ֖וּמוּ <WH6684> vai-ya-Tzu-mu and fasted שִׁבְעַ֥ת <WH7651> shiv-'At seven יָמִֽים׃ <WH3117> ya-Mim. days

וַיָּ֣מָת <WH4191> vai-Ya-mot died שָׁא֗וּל <WH7586> sha-'Ul, So Saul בְּמַֽעֲלוֹ֙ <WH4603> be-ma-'a-Lo which he committed אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> 'a-Sher which מָעַ֣ל <WH4604> ma-'Al for his transgression בַּֽיהוָ֔ה <WH3068> Yah-weh, against the LORD עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- because דְּבַ֥ר <WH1697> de-Var [even] against the word יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> Yah-weh of the LORD אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> 'a-Sher which לֹא־ <WH3808> lo- did not שָׁמָ֑ר <WH8104> sha-Mar; which he kept וְגַם־ <WH1571> ve-gam- and also לִשְׁא֥וֹל <WH7592> lish-'ol not and also for asking בָּא֖וֹב <WH178> ba-'ov [counsel] of [one that had] a familiar spirit לִדְרֽוֹשׁ׃ <WH1875> lid-Roosh. to enquire

וְלֹֽא־ <WH3808> ve-lo- and did not דָרַ֥שׁ <WH1875> da-Rash And enquired בַּֽיהוָ֖ה <WH3068> Yah-weh not of the LORD וַיְמִיתֵ֑הוּ <WH4191> vay-mi-Te-hu; therefore he slew וַיַּסֵּב֙ <WH5437> vai-yas-Sev him and turned אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- הַמְּלוּכָ֔ה <WH4410> ham-me-lu-Chah, the kingdom לְדָוִ֖יד <WH1732> le-da-Vid unto David בֶּן־ <WH1121> ben- the son יִשָֽׁי׃ <WH3448> yi-Shai. of Jesse פ Peh
